bitwarden.description: Bitwarden is an open source password management solution you can run on your own server.

gitea.description: Gitea is a lightweight code hosting solution written in Go.

jitsi.description: Jitsi is a free and open source video conferencing solution.

nextcloud.description: Nextcloud is a cloud storage service that offers a web interface and a desktop client.

ocserv.description: OpenConnect VPN to connect your devices and access the internet.

pleroma.description: Pleroma is a free and open source microblogging server.
